Articles.Content:
I dont think this is a gameplay question but the mods can move it if it is...

I used the patcher to update to 0.25. when i loaded it up the resolution settings were wrong so i fixed them. later when i loaded up chrome its displaying everything huge. and its not a zoom problem. it seems to be resolution but my laptop's resolution has not changed and ksp is no longer open. anyone have any ideas whats going on?

(oh and some of the parts are coming up twice in my parts lists in game)
In terms of parts being doubled, that happened to me, so I just downloaded it form the website (which was relatively slower) but got the job done correctly.

thats just the minor problem, but thanks.

i really need to get this other problem fixed tho..

The double parts is due to using the patcher. The part.cfg files were renamed so now they are duplicated. You'll need to delete the contents of your GameData directory and run the patcher again.

For your other problem, you may need to double check the KSP resolution setting to see if it made a mistake in saving. You can also edit the settings.cfg file directly (with notepad) and set the resolution you want by looking for the RESOLUTION lines.

-Claw

For your other problem, you may need to double check the KSP resolution setting to see if it made a mistake in saving. You can also edit the settings.cfg file directly (with notepad) and set the resolution you want by looking for the RESOLUTION lines.

I think its a Chrome problem because it wont load at all now, and i have removed KSP from my laptop.

thanks for trying guys
